Tejal,

 

Did you look for the missing Cactus property?  I don't know how to help
you here, but maybe a look at the following page might help:

 

http://java.sun.com/developer/technicalArticles/Programming/Stacktrace/

 

Andreas

 

________________________________

Tejal Khatri, Gurgaon
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2006 2:19 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] ChainedRuntimeException

 

Hi Friends,

I have been doing a test on my java class using cactus in intllij ide.
I am getting following exception. I am not able to solve this. Please
help.
